title: If there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed
OB: When there is no data available for a series, a friendly error message is not displayed.
EB: When there is no data available for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the series that does not have any data.
3. Verify if a friendly error message is displayed informing the user about the lack of data.
